title: Mercury Transit in the 1st House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 1st house for Sagittarius Ascendant, communication, intellect, and self-expression become highly visible. Thoughts turn optimistic, philosophical, and future-oriented, with a strong urge to speak honestly and share ideas. This is a powerful phase for learning, teaching, writing, and personal decision-making. However, blunt speech or overconfidence in opinions can create friction. When balanced with listening and clarity, this transit enhances persuasive expression, intellectual confidence, and purposeful self-presentation.

sections.title: Career
points: Teaching, writing, or advisory work supported

closing: This Mercury transit sharpens expression and intellect. With balance, it supports confident communication, learning, and purposeful self-direction.
